inn1.comm: pitched full very wide outside off and swinging away, left alone, given a wide
on a good length outside off, holding its line this time, left alone
pitches on a good length on the off and angling in, leaves it alone
full outside off, swinging away from the right hander, left alone
good length outside off, holding its lone, left alone yet again
back of a length on the off stump, gets on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
fuller on middle and leg, pushed to mid wicket
a poor start by Maharoof here, down the leg side this time, left alone
full outside the off stump, defended watchfully on the off side
good length outside off, angling away, left alone
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to the covers
good length on the off and swinging away, left alone
that was full on the pads, no swing on that one, flicked away to the square leg boundary
full length outside off, swinging away from the right hander, left alone
on a good length on the off stump, defended watchfully to the covers
back of a length on middle, tries to whip it away towards square leg, gets hit on the thighs, no run there
back of a length on middle and off, tries to defend it on the front foot, is hit on the elbow. He seems to be in a bit of pain there. Slight delay as he gets some medical attention.
another wide from Maharoof, well wide of the off stump, the batsman has nothing to do with it
good length on the off stump, tries to defend on the front foot, gets a thick outside edge to third man
good length outside off and swinging away, the batsman shoulders his arms
pitched full outside off, defended to the covers
pitches on a good length on the off stump and swings away, left alone. A Patient start by Zimbabwe here
back of a length outside off and swung in, the batsman didn't anticipate the movement, the in-swing took him by surprise there, he leaves it alone but the ball didn't  miss the off stump by much
full outside off, left alone yet again
good length on the off stump, defended on the front foot

full outside off and swinging in, the batsman gets on the front foot to defend, misses and is struck on the pads, the fielders go up, but the appeal is turned down. He was struck outside the line there
full outside off and swinging away, left alone, given a wide. Maharoof's misery continues
back of a length outside leg stump, leaves it alone, yet another wide
much better this time, Short of a good length on the off, punched off the back foot to short extra cover
back of a length on middle and leg, gets on the back foot and turns it to short mid-wicket
good length outside off and swinging in, left alone, went over the off stump
good length ball outside off, shoulders arms once again
back of a length outside off, lets it go
back of a length on middle and leg, deflects off the pads towards fine leg, leg bye given
good length on the off stump, defends it awkwardly, gets an inside edge onto his shoes
that was a good length outside off and swinging in, tries to prod at it, but withdraws at the last moment
full on middle and leg, flicked away straight to square leg
good length outside off, comes forward to defend, gets a thick outside edge wide of second slip towards third man
the first aggressive shot of the Zimbabwe innings! That was full outside off, Masakadza gets onto the front foot and drives it uppishly between mid off and cover for a boundary
and again! That was bowled back of a length outside off, Masakadza plans his front foot forward and swats it over the bowlers head for a one bounce four
short on middle and leg, swinging in, tries to work it away to fine leg but is struck on the hips
back of a length outside off this time, left alone
shot! that was short and wide, gets on the back foot and cuts it uppishly wide of point for a boundary
short on middle and off, defended watchfully back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and off, tries to drop it on the off side for a quick single, is sent back
short on middle and leg, and swinging down leg, tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, misses, given a wide. Maharoof struggling with his line here
back of a length on middle and leg, tries to work it away off the back foot towards square leg, misses, and is struck on the thighs.
good length on the off stump, stands tall and defends it back to the bowler
good length outside off and swinging in, gets outside the line to defend, misses, and is struck high on the pads
beaten! That was pitched on a good length on the off stump, the batsman comes forward to defend, but the ball leaves him at the last moment, carries at a good height to the keeper
back of a length on the off stump, walks down and tries to paddle it wide of short fine leg, gets to the fielder on the bounce off his pads and they scramble a quick single
on a good length on the off and swinging in, tries to defend it on the back foot, gets a thick outside edge straight to Kapugedara at second slip who takes a comfortable catch. One down!
short outside off and swinging in, gets on the back foot, opens the face of the bat and guides it wide of third man for a couple
full outside off and swinging in, left alone
good length on the off stump, defended on the front foot
full and wide and swinging away this time, left alone, given a wide
full outside off, tries to go for an expansive drive through the covers, flies off the outside edge over second slip to the third man boundary
good length outside off, left alone this time
good length outside off and leaving the right hander, left alone. Good bounce and carry there
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked to square leg
full on the off and swinging in, defended to short mid wicket
full on the pads, pushed wide of mid on for a couple
back of a length on middle and leg, defended off the back foot towards mid wicket
back of a length on the off and swung in sharply, tries to defend it on the back foot, is struck high on the pads
full outside off, tries to drive it through the covers, gets an inside edge onto his pads
back of a length on middle, tries to defend it on the back foot, gets a thick outside edge to third man
full outside the off, comes forward and defends
short outside the off, defended
fuller on middle and leg, chipped wide of mid wicket for a single
back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to the covers

runout, good length on the off stump, defended to cover, Chibabha calls for the single but sends Masakdza back only after he is almost halfway down the pitch, Tharanga at cover fields well and throws down the stumps at the non-strikers end with an under-arm flick to find Masakdza short of his ground
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
fuller on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg for a couple
beaten! full outside the off, Taibu tries to drive it towards mid off, the ball swings away at the last moment and evades the outside edge
good length outside off, held its line this time, left alone
full on the off stump and swinging away, left alone
beaten! good length on the off and angling away, Taibu comes forward to defend but the bal just about manages to escape the outside edge
back of a length outside off, tries to cut it, but ends up mistiming to the covers
back of a length outside off, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length outside off, pushed uppishly wide of mid off for a couple
good length on middle and leg, flicked to fine leg off the front foot
short and wide this time, cut away to third man
full outside off, sliced away wide of point for a couple
full outside off and swinging in, driven on the front foot to mid off
full outside off and swinging in yet again, tries to drive it to mid off but ends up getting a thick outside edge to third man
good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
shot! that was back of a length outside off, not quite there for a pull, but makes no difference to Taibu as he gets on the back foot and hits that wide of mid on for his first boundary
full outside off, defended watchfully, presents the full face of the bat there
good length outside off and angling in, guided well to third man. Taibu looking good here!
back of a length outside off and swinging away from Taibu, left alone
this one came in, good variation from Thushara, full outside off and Taibu leaves it alone yet again, that went over the middle and off stump
swinging away after pitching on a good length outside off, Taibu watches that one to the keeper
short and well wide of the off stump, Taibu attempts a cut wide of point, misses, but given a wide
back of a length outside off and swinging away, left alone
fuller this time, same line, left alone, Taibu taking his time here
back of a length outside off and moving away, Taibu stays his ground and upper cuts it to third man on the bounce
he continues his poor day with the ball, that was too wide outside off, Taibu has nothing to do with it
full on the off stump, defended towards the covers on the front foot
wide again, too wide and swinging away
much better! that was on a good length just slightly outside off, Taibu leaves that one alone
making him play this time, fuller outside off, Taibu gets onto the front foot and drives that one straight to cover
back of a length outside off, cut away to third man for a single
good length outside off, left alone by Chibhabha
short of a good length outside off, drops it onto the off side and calls for a quick single, Taibu sends him back wisely, keen not to repeat the Masakadza debacle
full on the pads, flicked wide of square leg for a couple
short and wide outside off, chops it down to point
back of a length, pitches outside leg and angles in towards middle, tries to whip it off his pads, misses
short outside off, chopped down to cover this time, not getting the timing right here
full outside off and swinging away from the right hander left alone
good length outside off, Taibu leaves that one alone as well
good length outside off and angling in, pushed off the front foot to point
short of a good length outside off, it's there to cut and that is exactly what Chibabha tries to do, misses
better execution this time! short and wide outside off, cuts it wide of point where the fielder gets his fingers to it, deflects to third man and a single is taken
full outside off, held its line, left alone to the keeper
good length on the off, angling in, worked away towards square leg for a single
good length on middle and leg, turned away wide of mid wicket for a single
bowled full outside off from round the wicket, angling in, gets well outside the line and looks to drive it wide of mid on, is struck on the pads and don't know what Thushara is appealing for there!
Chibhabha silences him this time with a beautiful off drive, that was full outside off and he got into the perfect position to drive it wide of mid off for a boundary
back of a length outside off, left alone, tried to play at it initially but wisely withdrew his shot at just the right time
short and wide and gets the treatment! cut away over the point fielder for the second boundary of the over
excellent comeback from Thushara. He gets over the wicket and rockets in a yorker on middle and off, Chibhabha is equal to the task though, and digs it out comfortably onto the off side
back of a length on middle and leg, worked away wide of square leg for a single
that was on a good length outside off, swinging away, left alone
short outside off, cut away powerfully towards point where Kapugedara dives full length to his left to prevent a certain boundary
good length on middle and leg, flicked to fine leg for a single
wide, yet another one from Maharoof who's probably bowled around a hundred today
full on middle and leg, driven straight to mid on
good length on the off stump, played back to the bowler
full outside off, Taibu gets onto the front foot and drives it well to pierce the gap between cover and cover-point for a couple.
flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long on
an off spinner, pitches outside off and spins in, defended
flatter outside off, an off spinner again, pushed wide of point for a single
an off spinner flighted on middle and leg, tries to flick it away but is struck on the back pad, the fielders go up but the appeal is turned down, seemed to be drifting down leg

spun away! the batsman is totally flummoxed there, pitches on a good length on the off and spins away just as Taibu tries to defend. Sangakkara takes off the bails and the appeal is referred but Taibu never left his crease

gone!! Maharoof has been gifted a wicket here, that was pitched full on middle and off, Chibhabha came down the track and tried to loft it over mid on, got the leading edge and Kulasekara at mid on ran back a few steps to take a well judged catch. There was no need for that shot but Chibhabha lost his concentration there!
back of a length on the off, turned away wide of mid wicket for a single
full on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
good length outside off, pushed to cover-point
full on middle and leg, flicked uppishly wide of fine leg for a single
what a shot! an off spinner flighted outside off, Taibu reverse sweeps that wide of slip and short third man for a boundary
another one, bowled flat outside leg stump, reverse-swept much squarer this time towards deep point
flat and quick again on middle and leg, turned to short mid wicket
flighted, pitches back of a length on middle and off, tries to defend it onto the on-side, gets a leading edge wide of the bowler on the off
tossed up, off spinner pitching on middle and sliding down leg, tries to defend, is rapped on the pads
tossed up outside off, defended onto the off side with a big stride forward
shot! short and wide outside off, Taibu cuts it wide of deep point for a couple
flighted outside off, defended watchfully on the front foot
tossed up outside off, cut away towards deep point for a couple
tossed up outside off, comes forward to defend, keeps really low, misses and so does Sangakkara and the ball rolls down  to the fine leg boundary for four byes
flighted outside off, reverse swept to deep point
short outside off, cut wide of point
flighted outside off, swept to deep square leg
flighted outside off again, reverse swept to third man
tossed up on middle and leg, tries to play it onto the leg side, misses
pitches on middle and leg, sweeps it wide of deep square leg for a couple
flighted outside off, driven to mid off
straighter on the off stump, pushed wide of mid off this time for a quick single
flighted on middle and leg, driven on the front foot to long on
top spinner, bowled on the off stump, tries to reverse sweep it fine, does not time it well enough, rolls wide of short third man for a single
short outside off, cut away well wide of deep point for three runs
tossed up outside off, reverse swept wide of deep point for a couple. This is good batting!
flat and quick outside off, goes for a cut, misses
reverse swept to short third man
tries to reverse sweep again, misses
flighted outside off, reverse swept yet again to deep point
shot!! that was flighted outside off, comes down the track and lofts it over the bowlers head for a big one
short outside off, pushed wide of deep point for a couple more

bowled 'im!! That was pitched on a good length on the off and spinning in, too close to cut, Matsinkinyeri gets on the back foot and looks to guide that wide of short third-man, gets an inside edge onto the off stump

gone! bowled flat and quick on middle and leg from round the wicket, pitches on a good length and straightens, Chigumbura comes forward to defend but makes no contact with the bat, struck low on the pads, Murali goes up, and the umpire raises his finger. That would have gone on to hit middle and leg
flighted outside off, defended on the front foot. Hat-trick averted
tries to reverse sweep that one, pitches on a good length outside off and spinning in, misses and sis truck high on the pads

another one! Zimbabwe losing it here! that was flighted outside off from round the wicket, Maruma tries to turn that away in the direction of short-fine leg, hits it straight to Kapugedara stationed at backward short leg exactly for that shot! Murali has changed this game in a matter of minutes
flighted outside off, driven to long off for a single
tossed up on middle and off, comes forward to drive, misses and is struck low on the pads, didn't get outside the line there, was struck in line with middle and off, and Mendis' appeal is upheld!
bowled flat outside the off, an off spinner, defended watchfully
flighted on middle and leg, pushed to mid wicket
flighted on the off stump, gets outside the line to defend, is rapped on the pads, there is an appeal but he was struck outside the line

stumped,that was bowled on a good length outside off, went the other way, Price didn't pick that one and left him at just the last moment as he came forward to defend, Sangakkara collects cleanly and clips off the bails to find the batsman with his right foot in the air, the appeal is referred and Price is rightly given out!
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long off
flat outside off, spinning in towards middle, strikes the batsman on the pads as he gets outside the line to defend
bowled on middle and leg from round the wicket, lobs up in the air off Mupariwa's pads, no contact with the bat there
defends awkwardly on the front foot

tossed up on middle and off from round the wicket, gets down on one knee to sweep that towards square leg, gets an inside edge onto the pads and the ball lobs up in the air to silly point where Tharanga takes a dolly
flat on middle and off from round the wicket, defended with some difficulty on the front foot
tossed up outside off, an off spinner, defended onto the leg side
short outside off, turned away wide of square leg, a single refused
pitches fuller on middle and leg, played onto the on-side
full outside off, reverse swept uppishly wide of point for a single
flighted outside off stump, defended
bowled im!! it's all over! flighted outside off, comes forward to defend, the ball goes through the gap between bat and pad and crashes into the off stump

inn2.comm: that was bowled back of a length on leg stump, tries to work it fine, hit on the thighs
full outside off, defended watchfully on the off side

runoutpitches short of a good length on middle and leg, dropped onto the on-side and the batsmen try to steal a quick single, but Mpofu picks up the ball, turns back and throws down the stumps at the non-strikers end. Tharanga is short of his ground and Zimbabwe have struck early
full outside off, driven on the front foot to mid off
short of a good length outside the off, some bounce there, defended awkwardly back to the bowler
full outside off, comes on the front foot and drives it to the covers
that pitched on a good length on leg stump and swinging towards off, gets the outside edge that falls just short of second slip
Sri Lanka off the mark, wide a wide outside off stump
good length outside off, defended watchfully on the off side
full on middle and leg, defended to cover yet again
shot! pitched full outside off, driven firmly to cover, where the fielder misfields, and allows the batsmen to run three
full outside leg stump, flicked uppishly over square leg for a couple more
full on middle and leg, defended on the front foot
good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
bowled on a good length on leg stump, glanced down to fine leg
full outside off, defended back to the bowler
back of a length on the off stump, played to point
good ball, pitches on a good length outside off and swings in, Sangakkara who initially thinks of playing at it, back away at just the last moment
back of a length on the off stump, defended on the back foot to cover
full outside off, Udawatte tries to push at it, gets the outside edge that falls just short of first slip
good length on leg stump, tries to work it away fine, is struck high on the pads, no run there
full on the pads and swinging down leg, tries to drive it wide of mid on, misses again
full on the pads, just turned away to fine leg for a single
good length on the off stump, defended to mid off
good length outside off, guided straight to point
short and wide, attempts a powerful cut over point, but gets a thick outside edge that flies off the bat over third man for a six!
full and wide outside off, swinging away, left alone
full outside off, driven wide of mid off for a couple. Didn't time that well enough!
good ball! that was short outside off, a bouncer, that the batsman pulls out off
good length outside off and swinging in, left alone to the keeper
back of a length outside off, turned away to square leg, no run there
short and wide, cut away to third man for a single
back of a length on middle and off, defended onto the leg side
good length outside off, swinging away from the left hander, left alone
short and wide outside off, cut away wide of third man for a couple
full on the pads, tried to glance it fine, but drops onto the on-side off the pads, a quick leg bye taken
full outside off, and swinging away, left alone
good length on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, driven straight to cover point
bad ball, that was full and wide outside off, plans his foot forward and drives it wide of mid off for a boundary
bowled back of a length on middle and leg from round the wicket, tries to fend it off, hits the glove and lobs up wide of the keeper, take a quick single
full outside off, angling in, left alone
back of a length outside off, swinging in, left alone yet again
good length outside off and swinging in, left alone once again, that was closer to the off stump
wide down the leg side
full and wide outside off, attempts an expansive drive wide of mid off, gets a thick outside edge on the bounce to third man
full outside the off, defended back to the bowler
good length outside off, that was dropped short of the fielder at point and the batsmen steal a quick single
good length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
full on middle and leg, driven back to the bowler
good length on the leg stump, turned away to fine leg for a single
bowled on a good length from round the wicket outside off, swinging in, defended to point
back of a length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
bouncer on middle and leg, Udawatte ducks, that was too high, given a wide
shot! short of a length on middle and off, pulled away to the square leg boundary
full outside off, goes for an expansive drive, misses
back of a length on middle and off, turned away to square leg
good length outside off, left alone
full outside off and swinging in, left alone yet again
wide outside off yet again, given
full on middle and off, driven towards cover where two fielders collide as they attempt to stop the ball. Timycen Maruma appears to have injured his elbow quite seriously there
full outside off, driven back wide of the bowler towards mid off
good length outside off, left alone
full on the off stump, defended straight to cover
good length on the off stump, pushed to cover on the front foot
full on middle and off, pushed to mid wicket
good length on middle and leg, defended onto the leg side
beaten! that was bowled on a full length just slightly wide of the off stump and evaded the left-hander just as he tried to drive it wide of mid off
full on middle and off, driven to mid off
dropped, that was pitched on a full length outside off, Udawatte drives at it, gets the outside edge straight to Sibanda at second slip where he spills a sitter. Poor fielding
short and wide outside off, cut away over the point fielder for a boundary
full on middle and off, driven firmly back past bowler for a couple in the direction of long off
short of a good length on the off, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, angling away, driven wide of a diving mid off for a boundary
good length outside off stump, dropped short of the mid off fielder for a quick single
beaten! that was bowled on a good length outside off, swung away as Udawatte tried to lethargically prod at it
wide outside off, and angling away even further, given a wide
good length on middle and leg, defended onto the leg side towards mid wicket
good length outside off, defended on the front foot
good length on the off stump, pushed wide of mid off for a single
full outside off, length ball, gets under it and strikes it uppishly wide of mid off for a boundary
full on middle and off, tries to drive it along the ground through the covers, does not time it well enough
gone! full outside the off, Udawatte cannot resist the temptation to go for another expansive drive, ends up hitting it uppishly and straight to cover where Matsikinyeri makes no mistake
full on the pads, flicked away to a squarish fine-leg
good length on the off stump, played back to the bowler
full on middle and leg, pushes it wide of mid on for a single
back of a length on middle and off, pushed back firmly off the back foot, straight onto the stumps at the non-strikers end
back of a length outside off, Sangakkara stands tall and punches it firmly wide of mid off for three runs
wide outside off and swinging away, wide given
good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
good length on the off stump, dropped onto the off side with soft hands and the batsmen steal a quick single
full on leg stump, Sangakkara walks across and flicks that uppishly towards fine leg
good length outside off, angling away from the left hander, left alone
back of a length this time on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
back of a length on the off stump, defended on the back foot to cover
short and wide, cut away to third man for a single
full on leg stump and swinging down, tries to glance it fine, is struck on the pads, a leg bye taken
good length on the off stump, defended solidly to short extra cover
good length on the off and swinging away, beats Jayawardene who tries who tries to play at it but is deceived by the swing
back of a length on middle and leg, turned wide of square leg
good length on the off stump, defended confidently off the back foot
full outside off and swinging away, left alone by Sangakkara
good length outside off stump, Sangakkara shoulders his arms to that one
full on the off stump, defends it to extra cover
full length outside off, defended on the off side
full outside off, driven wide of mid off for a couple
good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
good length on leg stump, flicked away to fine leg
good length on the off stump, Sangakkara defends it somewhat uncomfortably back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and leg, turned to square leg
good length outside off, Jayawardene guides that wide of second slip for a single
good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, Sangakkara goes for a drive towards mid off, misses
back of a length on the off stump, pushed firmly off the back foot to extra cover
beaten! that pitched outside off and swung in, Sangakkara didn't anticipate the movement, tried to play at it but the ball went through him and just over the off stump to the keeper
full on middle and leg, driven wide of mid on for a single
full on the pads, Sangakkara flicks that between square leg and mid wicket for three runs
full on middle and off, defended onto the off side
short and wide outside off, cut away straight to point, will be disappointed for not having pierced the gap there
full on middle and leg, driven back past the bowler towards mid on
back of a length outside off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
full outside off, Jayawardene drives at it lazily, hits the inside half of the bat and rolls back to the bowler
full outside off, pushed to cover
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
full outside off and swinging away, left alone
came in this time, full outside off, and Sangakkara has nothing to do with it
good length outside off, guided wide of point for a quick single
good length on the off stump, defended on the off side
tossed up outside off, dropped onto the off side short of cover for a quick single
tossed up on middle and leg, turned away to short fine-leg
arm ball on middle and off, defended on the front foot
flighted on middle and leg this time, defended yet again
back of a length and quicker through the air on leg stump, tries to turn it away, is hit on the pads
flighted on middle and off, driven to long off for a single
flighted on leg stump, on a full length, flicked to deep square leg for a single
flighted outside off and spinning away, left alone
tossed up outside off yet again, short of a good length, left alone
full outside off and spinning away, left
shot! that was pitched short of a length outside off, Sangakkara gets on the back foot and punches it between point and cover for three runs
back of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to long on
short of a length outside off once again, cut away straight to point
bowled from round the wicket, on a good length on middle and leg, worked away wide of mid wicket for a single
short of a good length on the off stump, pushed to mid wicket
flighted outside off and spinning into the left hander, Sangakkara shoulders arms to that one
tossed up on middle and leg turned away wide of short fine-leg for a single
tossed up outside off, driven back to the bowler
flighted on a good length outside off yet again, pushed back to the bowler
flatter outside off and spinning away, left alone
flighted outside off, left alone
tossed up on a good length on the off stump, defended
short and wide and Sangakkara cashes in. That was cut away wide of the point fielder for a boundary
and again! that was short and wide, rocks on the back foot and strikes that wide of cover this time for another four. Finally some excitement!
tossed up, much fuller outside the off this time, played to short extra cover
beaten! flighted on the off stump, Jayawardene gets on the front foot to defend, is done in by the spin as the ball spins away at the last moment
flat on middle and leg, tries to turn it away, misses, hit high on the pads
bowled im!! that was short on middle and off, kept low, Jayawardene gets on the back foot to pull it away, but was not prepared for the ball keeping low, goes under the bat and onto the off stump!
flighted outside off, defended watchfully
pitches on leg stump, tries to flick it away, hit on the pads
tossed up on the middle stump, drifting in and spins away after pitching, Kapugedara defends it onto the off side
tossed up on middle and leg, defended
pitches short of a good length on the off stump, defended on the off side
back of a length outside off, pushed to the covers
flighted on middle and off, defended
flatter on the off, defended yet again
flighted on middle and off, dropped onto the leg side. Normal services resume
good loop there for Price, pitches on a good ;length on middle and leg, defended
short and flat on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to cover
big one! that was tossed up outside off, Kapugedara comes down the track and lofts it over the deep cover boundary for a big six. That woke the crowd up
short of a good length outside off, driven wide of cover for a single
flighted on a full length outside off, Sangakkara tries to paddle that one towards short-fine leg, misses
flighted outside off stump, pushed wide of mid wicket for an easy single
flighted outside off, pitches on a good length, driven firmly off the back foot to long off
flighted on middle and leg, worked away straight to square leg
flat on the off stump, driven to long on
flighted outside off stump, full, driven back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
flighted outside off, pushed back to the bowler
flat on middle and leg, pushed uppishly to long on
that was tossed up outside off, Sangakkara gets down on one knee and sweeps it to the deep square leg boundary
flat and much quicker through the air outside off, left alone by Sangakkara
tossed up on middle and leg, turned away towards square leg
flighted on middle and off, worked away wide of mid wicket for a single
short of a length on leg stump, flicked to deep square leg for a single
short of a good length on middle and leg, tries to flick it away, gets a leg bye towards short fine leg
short outside off, pushed to cover
flighted on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
quicker through the air, flat on middle, paddle-swept to fine leg
big one! that was flat and a touch fuller on the off stump, comes down the track and strikes it powerfully over the long off boundary for a flat six
flighted on middle and leg, driven straight o midwicket
flighted outside the off stump, Sangakkara comes down the track and flicks it away to deep square leg
wide down the leg side, that was a misidirected arm ball

gone! flighted on the off stump, inducing the batsman to go for another big one, Kapugedara attempts to do just that but fails ti time it well enough, lofts it up high in the air but straight to Sibanda at long off. A wicket against the run of play here
flat on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
short on the off stump, pulled away to deep mid wicket
tossed up outside off, pitches on a good length and spins back in, Sangakkara defends it on the back foot
slightly fuller this time, defended off the back foot yet again
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
flighted on the off, driven to extra cover
tossed up on leg stump, dropped onto the leg side, short of mid wicket, for a quick single
flighted on the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
good length on middle and leg, defended to forward short leg
tossed up on the off stump, defended
wide down the leg side
flighted outside off and spinning in, pushed to a deepish mid-on
flighted outside the off stump, defended back to the bowler
flatter outside off stump, Mubarak in no hurry here, plays it back to the bowler
tossed up, pitches on a good length outside off and spins in, defended watchfully
quicker through the air, pitches on a good length outside off, defended
short outside off, cut straight to point
flighted outside the off stump, played back to the bowler
that's it! it's all over!,that was tossed up on middle and leg, Sangakkara came down the track and lofted it over the bowlers head for a one-bounce four to the long on boundary
